00170    unsigned char i;
00171    static unsigned long on_time;
00172    float frac;
00173    unsigned long expired;
00174 
00175    /* turn output off after on-time expired */
00176    for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00177       if (user_data.power[i] < 100) {
00178          expired = time() - on_time;
00179          if (expired >= (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i])) {
00180             frac = user_data.power[i] - (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i]);
00181 
00182             if (frac == 0 || expired >= (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i]) + 1) {
00183                output &= ~BIT(i);
00184             } else if (cycle > 0) {
00185                if ((float) ca[i] / cycle > frac) {
00186                   output &= ~BIT(i);
00187                } else {
00188                   ca[i]++;
00189                }
00190             } else {
00191                ca[i]++;
00192             }
00193          }
00194       }
00195 
00196    /* turn all outputs on every second */
00197    if (time() - on_time >= 100) {
00198       on_time = time();
00199       for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00200          if (user_data.power[i] > 0 && user_data.out[i])
00201             output |= BIT(i);
00202 
00203       cycle = (cycle + 1) % 10;
00204 
00205       if (cycle == 0)
00206          for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00207             ca[i] = 0;
00208    }
00209 
00210    /* set outputs according to main switch */
00211    for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00212       if (user_data.power[i] >= 100) {
00213          if (user_data.out[i])
00214             output |= BIT(i);
00215          else
00216             output &= ~BIT(i);
00217       }
00218 
00219    /* write output to P1 */
00220    P1 = output;
